name: SENTINEL Test Alpha 1
description:
This is a 2D Platformer that I began working on as my college thesis. We are looking to publish a demo of the game on Steam by the end of this year, so stay tuned!

For bug reports and suggestions, either leave a comment below or shoot us an email at sentinelsuggestions@gmail.com. Images and video clips will help us fix things faster, so include some if you can. Thanks!
